EEBO1.description: Currently displayed: a subset of texts from Early English Books Online that contains approximately the same number of words as the full Women Writers Online corpus, to allow for experimental comparisons between the two corpora. This is one of several EEBO corpora, each of which has a different selection of texts.

EEBO2.description: Currently displayed: a subset of texts from Early English Books Online that contains approximately the same number of words as the full Women Writers Online corpus, to allow for experimental comparisons between the two corpora. This is one of several EEBO corpora, each of which has a different selection of texts.

EEBO3.description: Currently displayed: a subset of texts from Early English Books Online that contains approximately the same number of words as the full Women Writers Online corpus, to allow for experimental comparisons between the two corpora. This is one of several EEBO corpora, each of which has a different selection of texts.

EEBO4.description: Currently displayed: a subset of texts from Early English Books Online that contains approximately the same number of words as the full Women Writers Online corpus, to allow for experimental comparisons between the two corpora. This is one of several EEBO corpora, each of which has a different selection of texts.

VWWP.shortDescription: The Victorian Women Writers Project Corpus
VWWP.description: Currently displayed: the entire Victorian Women Writers Project corpus of women's writing from 1830 to 1929.

VWWP and WWO.shortDescription: The Victorian Women Writers Project and Women Writers Online Combined Corpus
VWWP and WWO.description: Currently displayed: a combined corpus that includes all texts from both the Victorian Women Writers Project and Women Writers Online.

VWWP and 19thc WWO.shortDescription: The Victorian Women Writers Project and 19thC Women Writers Online Combined Corpus
VWWP and 19thc WWO.description: Currently displayed: a combined corpus that includes the full set of Victorian Women Writers Projects texts and the subset of the Women Writers Online corpus that was published in the 19th century.

WWO 17th century.description: Currently displayed: a subset of the Women Writers Online corpus that includes texts that were published in the 16th and 17th centuries. Because this model is trained on a small corpus, it should be treated as experimental.

WWO 18th century.description: Currently displayed: a subset of the Women Writers Online corpus that includes texts that were published in the 18th century. Because this model is trained on a small corpus, it should be treated as experimental.

WWO 19th Century.description: Currently displayed: a subset of the Women Writers Online corpus that includes texts that were published in the 19th century. Because this model is trained on a small corpus, it should be treated as experimental.

WWO Corpus.description: Currently displayed: the entire Women Writers Online corpus of women's writing from 1526 to 1850.

WWO Body Content.shortDescription: Text content extracted from the <body> element in the WWO, excludes front and back matter
WWO Body Content.description: Currently displayed: a subset of the Women Writers Online corpus that includes the body of each text, without front or back matter.

WWO Verse.shortDescription: Poetry and verse subset of the WWO
WWO Verse.description: Currently displayed: a subset of the Women Writers Online corpus that includes all text marked as appearing in a verse line group (<lg>). Because this model is trained on a small corpus, it should be treated as experimental.

WWO Prose.shortDescription: Prose only subset of the WWO
WWO Prose.description:
Currently displayed: a subset of the Women Writers Online corpus that includes all text marked as appearing in a paragraph (

). Because this model is trained on a small corpus, it should be treated as experimental.

EEBO.description: This subset of texts from Early English Books Online contains approximately the same number of words as the full Women Writers Online corpus, to allow for experimental comparisons between the two corpora. This is the first of several EEBO corpora that will be included in the Word Vector Interface.

VWWP Morphadorned.shortDescription: Morphadorned Victorian Women Writers Project Corpus
VWWP Morphadorned.description: We have parsed the TEI of the VWWP and extracted its body content. It has been further regularized with Morphadorner.

WWO Global Publications.shortDescription: Texts published outside the U.S. in the WWO
WWO Global Publications.description: Texts published outside the U.S. Texts have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus.

WWO U.S. Publications.description: Only texts published in the United States. Texts have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus.

eme-Morphed WWO 17th Century.shortDescription: Morphadorned (eme) WWO texts from the 17th century
eme-Morphed WWO 17th Century.description: This subset of the WWO corpus includes texts that appear in the 16th and 17th century. They have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with an Early Modern English variant of Morphadorner.

eme-Morphed WWO 18th Century.shortDescription: Morphadorned (eme) WWO texts from the 18th century
eme-Morphed WWO 18th Century.description: This subset of the WWO corpus includes texts that appear in the 18th century. They have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with an Early Modern English variant of Morphadorner.

eme-Morphed WWO 19th Century.shortDescription: Morphadorned (eme) WWO texts from the 19th century
eme-Morphed WWO 19th Century.description: This subset of the WWO corpus includes texts that appear in the 19th century. They have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with an Early Modern English variant of Morphadorner.

eme-Morphed WWO Corpus.shortDescription: All Morphadorned (eme) texts from the WWO
eme-Morphed WWO Corpus.description: This is the entire corpus of the WWO. They have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with an Early Modern English variant of Morphadorner.

eme-Morphed WWO Body Content.shortDescription: Text content extracted from the <body> element in the WWO and Morphadorned (eme), excludes front and back matter
eme-Morphed WWO Body Content.description: This includes text content from the <body> element in the WWO. They have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with an Early Modern English variant of Morphadorner.

eme-Morphed WWO Verse.shortDescription: Morphadorned (eme) poetry and verse subset of the WWO
eme-Morphed WWO Verse.description: Text content extracted from the <lg> element (line group) of the WWO. They have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with an Early Modern English variant of Morphadorner.

eme-Morphed WWO Prose.shortDescription: Morphadorned (eme) prose only subset of the WWO
eme-Morphed WWO Prose.description:
Text content extracted from the

element (paragraph) of the WWO. They have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with an Early Modern English variant of Morphadorner.

eme-Morphed WWO Global Publications.shortDescription: Morphadorned (eme) texts published outside the U.S. in the WWO
eme-Morphed WWO Global Publications.description: Texts published outside the U.S. Texts have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with an Early Modern English variant of Morphadorner.

eme-Morphed WWO U.S. Publications.shortDescription: Morphadorned (eme) U.S. publications in the WWO
eme-Morphed WWO U.S. Publications.description: Only texts published in the United States. Texts have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with an Early Modern English variant of Morphadorner.

Morphadorned WWO 17th Century.shortDescription: Morphadorned WWO texts from the 17th century
Morphadorned WWO 17th Century.description: This subset of the WWO corpus includes texts that appear in the 16th and 17th century. They have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with Morphadorner.

Morphadorned WWO 18th Century.shortDescription: Morphadorned WWO texts from the 18th century
Morphadorned WWO 18th Century.description: This subset of the WWO corpus includes texts that appear in the 18th century. They have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with Morphadorner.

Morphadorned WWO 19th Century.shortDescription: Morphadorned WWO texts from the 19th century
Morphadorned WWO 19th Century.description: This subset of the WWO corpus includes texts that appear in the 19th century. They have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with Morphadorner.

Morphadorned WWO Corpus.shortDescription: All Morphadorned texts from the WWO
Morphadorned WWO Corpus.description: This is the entire corpus of the WWO. They have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with Morphadorner.

Morphadorned WWO Body Content.shortDescription: Text content extracted from the <body> element in the WWO and Morphadorned, excludes front and back matter
Morphadorned WWO Body Content.description: This includes text content from the <body> element in the WWO. They have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with Morphadorner.

Morphadorned WWO Verse.shortDescription: Morphadorned poetry and verse subset of the WWO
Morphadorned WWO Verse.description: Text content extracted from the <lg> element (line group) of the WWO. They have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with Morphadorner.

Morphadorned WWO Prose.shortDescription: Morphadorned prose only subset of the WWO
Morphadorned WWO Prose.description:
Text content extracted from the

element (paragraph) of the WWO. They have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with Morphadorner.

Morphadorned WWO Global Publications.shortDescription: Morphadorned texts published outside the U.S. in the WWO
Morphadorned WWO Global Publications.description: Texts published outside the U.S. Texts have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with Morphadorner.

Morphadorned WWO U.S. Publications.shortDescription: Morphadorned U.S. publications in the WWO
Morphadorned WWO U.S. Publications.description: Only texts published in the United States. Texts have been prepared using XSLT and XQuery processes that clean and regularize the corpus. They have been further regularized with Morphadorner.
